name: AlertDialog.Root

preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scroll on the body when the alert dialog is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: 是否在警报对话框打开时阻止在正文上滚动。

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the alert dialog when the escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 是否在按下转义键时关闭警报对话框。

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether to close the alert dialog when a click occurs outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: 是否在警报对话框外部发生单击时关闭警报对话框。

open.description: Whether or not the alert dialog is open.

openFocus.description: Override the initial focus when the alert dialog is opened.
openFocus.description_zh: 打开警报对话框时覆盖初始焦点。

closeFocus.description: Override the focus when the alert dialog is closed.
closeFocus.description_zh: 关闭警报对话框时覆盖焦点。

portal.description: Where to render the alert dialog when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: 警报对话框打开时的呈现位置。默认为正文。可以通过传递 null 来禁用

description: The root component used to set and manage the state of the alert dialog.

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: A callback function called when the open state changes.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when the open state changes.

events.name: onOutsideClick
events.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
events.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: 组件中元素的 ID，当您不一定希望提供自定义 ID，但仍希望访问正在分配的 ID（如果有）时，非常有用。
